Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.
We are happy to extend this favour to you, {STR_LeaderName}.
We welcome you, {STR_LeaderName}. What can we do for each other?
欢迎，{STR_LeaderName}。我们相互之间可以帮上什么忙吗？
{STR_LeaderName}, in light of our burgeoning relationship, we ask you to lend your assistance in this matter.
{STR_LeaderName}，考虑到我们迅速发展的关系，我们请求你帮助我们处理这件事。
Very well, we will act accordingly.
非常好，我们会采取相应行动。
{STR_LeaderName}, let us stop this violence. Please accept our surrender.
{STR_LeaderName}，停止这场暴力的纷争吧。请接受我们的投降。
In order to form a peace deal, we want the following things from you.
为了达成和平协议，我们希望从你那儿得到以下物品。
This is unfortunate, {STR_LeaderName}, but in light of recent events, I think it is best if we start from a clean slate to give both sides another chance to prove that we can cooperate and coexist.
很不幸，{STR_LeaderName}，但考虑到最近发生的事件，我认为我们应当冰释前嫌，重归于好，给双方一个机会，证明我们可以合作共存。
Hello {STR_LeaderName}. In light of your recent actions and our worsening relationship, I am afraid our diplomatic state has withered like a plant without water.
你好，{STR_LeaderName}。考虑到你最近的行为和我们之间持续恶化的关系，恐怕我们的外交关系已经如同失去了水源的植物一般枯萎破裂了。
Greetings {STR_LeaderName}. Due to our continued coexistence and your recent actions to our favor, we have new diplomatic options we wish to discuss, should you feel so inclined.
你好，{STR_LeaderName}。鉴于我们能够持久的共存和你最近帮助我们行为，如果你愿意的话，我们希望讨论一些新的外交选项。

You leave us no choice, {STR_LeaderName}. This is the last drop that overflows the bucket of blood to wash our empires red. War will be waged between our factions, and history will only remember the virtuous victor. The defeated will become dust and ash. History has no mercy for the weak.
你让我们别无选择，{STR_LeaderName}。这将是鲜血之桶中溢出的最后一滴用来洗红我们帝国的鲜血。我们的阵营之间将会爆发战争，历史只会记住高尚的胜利者，而失败者将会化为尘埃和灰烬。历史不会同情弱者。
来我们这儿有什么事吗，{STR_LeaderName}？
{STR_LeaderName}, we first have a test for you to prove your worth.
{STR_LeaderName}，我们会先对你进行检验来证明你的价值。
You have made an enemy this day, {STR_LeaderName}!
我们能够接受这些条款。
We bow to your strength, {STR_LeaderName}. Please accept our surrender.
我们臣服于你的力量，{STR_LeaderName}，请接受我们的投降。
In order to form a peace deal, we want the following things from you.
为了达成和平协议，我们希望从你那儿得到以下物品。
This is unfortunate, {STR_LeaderName}, but in light of recent events, I think it is best if we start from a clean slate to give both sides another chance to prove that we can cooperate and coexist.
很不幸，{STR_LeaderName}，但考虑到最近发生的事件，我认为我们应当冰释前嫌，重归于好，给双方一个机会，证明我们可以合作共存。
Hello {STR_LeaderName}. In light of your recent actions and our worsening relationship, I am afraid our diplomatic state has withered like a plant without water.
你好，{STR_LeaderName}。考虑到你最近的行为和我们之间持续恶化的关系，恐怕我们的外交关系已经如同失去了水源的植物一般枯萎破裂了。
Greetings {STR_LeaderName}. Due to our continued coexistence and your recent actions to our favor, we have new diplomatic options we wish to discuss, should you feel so inclined.
你好，{STR_LeaderName}。鉴于我们能够持久的共存和你最近帮助我们行为，如果你愿意的话，我们希望讨论一些新的外交选项。

You leave us no choice, {STR_LeaderName}. This is the last drop that overflows the bucket of blood to wash our empires red. War will be waged between our factions, and history will only remember the virtuous victor. The defeated will become dust and ash. History has no mercy for the weak.
你让我们别无选择，{STR_LeaderName}。这将是鲜血之桶中溢出的最后一滴用来洗红我们帝国的鲜血。我们的阵营之间将会爆发战争，历史只会记住高尚的胜利者，而失败者将会化为尘埃和灰烬。历史不会同情弱者。
你接近我们有什么意图，{STR_LeaderName}？
Hello {STR_LeaderName}. Do you wish to talk?
We have a mission for you {STR_LeaderName}, should you choose to accept it.
如果你愿意的话，我们有一个任务要给你，{STR_LeaderName}。
我们的关系发生了改变。
In order to form a peace deal, we want the following things from you.
为了达成和平协议，我们希望从你那儿得到以下物品。
This is unfortunate, {STR_LeaderName}, but in light of recent events, I think it is best if we start from a clean slate to give both sides another chance to prove that we can cooperate and coexist.
很不幸，{STR_LeaderName}，但考虑到最近发生的事件，我认为我们应当冰释前嫌，重归于好，给双方一个机会，证明我们可以合作共存。
Hello {STR_LeaderName}. In light of your recent actions and our worsening relationship, I am afraid our diplomatic state has withered like a plant without water.
你好，{STR_LeaderName}。考虑到你最近的行为和我们之间持续恶化的关系，恐怕我们的外交关系已经如同失去了水源的植物一般枯萎破裂了。
Greetings {STR_LeaderName}. Due to our continued coexistence and your recent actions to our favor, we have new diplomatic options we wish to discuss, should you feel so inclined.
你好，{STR_LeaderName}。鉴于我们能够持久的共存和你最近帮助我们行为，如果你愿意的话，我们希望讨论一些新的外交选项。

You leave us no choice, {STR_LeaderName}. This is the last drop that overflows the bucket of blood to wash our empires red. War will be waged between our factions, and history will only remember the virtuous victor. The defeated will become dust and ash. History has no mercy for the weak.
你让我们别无选择，{STR_LeaderName}。这将是鲜血之桶中溢出的最后一滴用来洗红我们帝国的鲜血。我们的阵营之间将会爆发战争，历史只会记住高尚的胜利者，而失败者将会化为尘埃和灰烬。历史不会同情弱者。
Greetings. What do you wish to discuss?
We look forward to a prosperous future together.
我们期待能共同拥有一个繁盛的未来。
Speak quickly before I lose my patience.
趁我还有耐心，有话快说。
We have been requested to join this war. Prepare yourself, as our combined might will destroy you!
我们收到邀请加入这场战争。做好准备，我们团结的力量将会把你摧毁！
团结一致，我们将摧毁他们！
We wish to change our diplomatic state.
我们想要改变我们的外交状况。
We seek collaboration, to work together for a brighter future.
我们寻求合作，希望能够共同建造一个更美好的未来。
We should each go our seperate ways in this world.
We would like access to this location. Could you please leave? {INT_Cost}[influence/]
我们想进入这个地点，请问你能离开么？{INT_Cost}[influence/]
Is there anything we can do for you?
有什么我们可以帮你的？
Please show us to your commander.
请让我们见见你们的指挥官。
To further our mutal goals, we will take care of this matter for you.
为了促进我们的共同目标，我们将会为你处理此事。
We accept your surrender. Let there be peace again.
我们接受你的投降，让和平再次到来。
We wish to trade with you.
我们想要与你进行交易。
We propose a cease of hostilities.
我们提议停止敌对状态。
We want you to join us in our war.
我们想要你加入我们的战斗。
We wish to change our diplomatic state.
我们想要改变我们的外交状况。
You would be wise to join us.
We do not care to associate ourselves with you.
我们不想与你扯上关系。
Withdraw your forces or face the consequences. {INT_Cost}[influence/]
撤走你的部队，否则后果自负。 {INT_Cost}[influence/]
Do you have any tasks available?
You are defeated. Your submission is accepted.
你被击败了，我们同意你的投降。
We propose a cease of hostilities.
我们提议停止敌对状态。
We want you to join us in our war.
我们想要你加入我们的战斗。
We wish to change our diplomatic state.
我们想要改变我们的外交状况。
We come in peace and offer you protection.
我们抱着橄榄枝而来，为你提供庇护。
We will each go our own way.
We require this location. Please vacate the area. {INT_Cost}[influence/]
这里是我们的地盘，请离开这里。{INT_Cost}[influence/]
What can we help you with?
我们可以帮你做点什么？
We would like to talk with your commander.
我们想要和你的指挥官谈谈。
We are here to discuss a trade.
我们是来这儿商议贸易事项的。
We propose a cease of hostilities.
我们提议停止敌对状态。
We want you to join us in our war.
我们想要你加入我们的战斗。
[popUpHeader]Change Relation[/popUpHeader][br/][popUpDesc]Change the relation with the {STR_FactionName} in question.[/popUpDesc]
[popUpHeader]融合[/popUpHeader][br/][popUpDesc]与{STR_FactionName}展开一段繁荣的关系。[/popUpDesc]

[popUpHeader]Evasion[/popUpHeader][br/][popUpDesc]Declare that you will not interact with the {STR_FactionName}. In return, they will not interfere with your matters.[br/] NOTE: breaking this deal will result in war.[/popUpDesc]
[popUpHeader]回避[/popUpHeader][br/][popUpDesc]宣称你不会与{STR_FactionName}进行互动。同样，他们将不会干涉你的事务。[br/]注意：破坏这个协定将会引发战争。[/popUpDesc]
[popUpHeader]Withdraw[/popUpHeader][br/][popUpDesc]Spend influence to remove an army from this location.[/popUpDesc]
[popUpHeader]撤军[/popUpHeader][br/][popUpDesc]花费影响力移除该地点一支军队。[/popUpDesc]
[popUpHeader]Quest[/popUpHeader][br/][popUpDesc]Receive a quest from the {STR_FactionName} to improve your relation with them. [/popUpDesc]
[popUpHeader]任务[/popUpHeader][br/][popUpDesc]接受{STR_FactionName}的任务来改善你与他们的关系。[/popUpDesc]
[popUpHeader]Integration[/popUpHeader][br/][popUpDesc]Enter the highest state of Integration with the {STR_FactionName}.[br/][br/] Required: {INT_RequiredRelValue}[diplomaticlinks/][/popUpDesc]
[popUpHeader]融合[/popUpHeader][br/][popUpDesc]与{STR_FactionName}展开最高等级的融合关系。[br/][br/]需要：{INT_RequiredRelValue}[diplomaticlinks/][/popUpDesc]

[popUpHeader]Protective Integration[/popUpHeader][br/][popUpDesc]Enter a state of Protective Integration with the {STR_FactionName}.[br/][br/] Required: {INT_RequiredRelValue}[diplomaticlinks/] [br/]Bonus: when the {STR_FactionName} is attacked, you will receive a Casus Belli towards the aggressor.[/popUpDesc]
[popUpHeader]保护性融合[/popUpHeader][br/][popUpDesc]与{STR_FactionName}展开保护性融合关系。[br/][br/]需要：{INT_RequiredRelValue}[diplomaticlinks/]。[br/]加成：当{STR_FactionName}被攻击时，你将获得对侵略者的宣战理由。[/popUpDesc]
[popUpHeader]Peace[/popUpHeader][br/][popUpDesc]Enter a peaceful relationship with the {STR_FactionName}.[br/][br/] Required: {INT_RequiredRelValue}[diplomaticlinks/][/popUpDesc]
[popUpHeader]Neutral[/popUpHeader][br/][popUpDesc]Enter a neutral state with the {STR_FactionName}.[/br][/br] Required: {INT_RequiredRelValue}[diplomaticlinks/][/popUpDesc]
[popUpHeader]前往居住地[/popUpHeader][br/][popUpDesc]与居住地展开协商。[/popUpDesc]
[popUpHeader]End The War[/popUpHeader][br/][popUpDesc]Accept the peace deal from the {STR_FactionName}. [/popUpDesc]
[popUpHeader]Trade[/popUpHeader][br/][popUpDesc]Open the trade screen in the right panel to buy from the {STR_FactionName}. [/popUpDesc]
[popUpHeader]交易[/popUpHeader][br/][popUpDesc]打开右方面板的交易界面，从{STR_FactionName}处购买物品。[/popUpDesc]
[popUpHeader]Request peace[/popUpHeader][br/][popUpDesc]Request peace with {STR_FactionName} and see their peace proposal.[/popUpDesc]
[popUpHeader]请求和平[/popUpHeader][br/][popUpDesc]请求与{STR_FactionName}和平相处并查看他们的和平提议。[/popUpDesc]
[popUpHeader]Call to War[/popUpHeader][br/][popUpDesc]Ask the {STR_FactionName} to declare war on a player you are at war with.[/popUpDesc]
[popUpHeader]战争召唤[/popUpHeader][br/][popUpDesc]要求{STR_FactionName}向与你交战的玩家宣战。[/popUpDesc]
[popUpHeader]Accept[/popUpHeader][br/][popUpDesc]Accept peace deal. You will lose all items shown.[/popUpDesc]
[popUpHeader]同意[/popUpHeader][br/][popUpDesc]接受和平协议。你将失去所有显示的物品。[/popUpDesc]
[popUpHeader]拒绝[/popUpHeader][br/][popUpDesc]拒绝和平协议。战争继续。[/popUpDesc]

Purchase ownership of this dwelling. This can only be done if you have a Colony near the sector that can accept the dwelling as a sector. Owning a dwelling means only you and your allies can interact with it. In addition, a dwelling sector functions as a fully upgraded sector in a single resource, shown in the sector overview panel.
购买该居住地的所有权。你只有在该区域附近拥有殖民地且该殖民地能够将该居住地纳为区域时，才可进行该操作。拥有居住地意味着只有你和你的盟友能够与其进行互动。此外，居住地区域与完全升级的单一资源区域作用相同，且将显示在区域总览面板中。
The {STR_FactionName} were called to war against you
Ask the faction to take up arms in an ongoing war.
要求阵营全副武装加入正在进行的战争。
I see that you are working with our rivals. We do not take kindly to those who aid our foes. Tread carefully!
我发现你正与我们的敌人合作。我们不喜欢那些帮助我们敌人的人，你需要小心了！
Doing quests for other factions will damage your relationship with this faction!
帮助其他阵营完成任务会破坏你与该阵营的关系！

The faction will not attack another player they are at relation state {XML_DIPLOMACY@FACTION_DIPLOMATIC_STATE@DEFENSIVEPACT} or {XML_DIPLOMACY@FACTION_DIPLOMATIC_STATE@ALLIANCE} with and can therefore not be called to war with this player.
该阵营不会攻击处于{XML_DIPLOMACY@FACTION_DIPLOMATIC_STATE@DEFENSIVEPACT}或{XML_DIPLOMACY@FACTION_DIPLOMATIC_STATE@ALLIANCE}关系状态的玩家，因此也不会被召唤与该玩家开战。
Tooltip description explaining why a faction can't be called to war against a certain player. The relation states can be found in DIPLOMACY.XML, they are "Friendship" and "Integration".
The faction is already at war with this player and cannot be called to war against them.
该阵营已经和该玩家开战了，不能再被召唤去对抗他们。
Tooltip description explaining why a faction can't be called to war against a certain player.
Used as modifier to describe a change to a relation, shown in lists/breakdowns
Used as modifier to describe a change to a relation, shown in lists/breakdowns
Used as modifier to describe a change to a relation, shown in lists/breakdowns
为其他阵营完成了任务
Used as modifier to describe a change to a relation, shown in lists/breakdowns
Used as modifier to describe a change to a relation, shown in lists/breakdowns
Used as modifier to describe a change to a relation, shown in lists/breakdowns
Used as modifier to describe a change to a relation, shown in lists/breakdowns
让我们看看要求的区域。
Show the sector that will be given to the faction making the demand.
显示该阵营要求获得的区域。

In the text below, text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.

In the text below, any inserted strings - anything of the form {text} - is replaced by an integer value for the thing described in the brackets. If the {text} is not followed by a unit - e.g. shields, hitpoints - the icon for the unit is inserted together with the integer. The same holds for symbols - e.g. '+', '%' - which are occasionally inserted together with the integer.
For references to game terminology and in-world references, please check the glossary delivered as part of the documentation.
